position.name: position
position.appliesTo: all elements except table-column-group and table-column

top.name: top
top.percentages: refer to height of containing block
top.computedValue: the keyword auto or a computed <length-percentage> value
top.animationType: length or percentage by computed value type

right.name: right
right.percentages: refer to height of containing block
right.computedValue: the keyword auto or a computed <length-percentage> value
right.animationType: length or percentage by computed value type

bottom.name: bottom
bottom.percentages: refer to height of containing block
bottom.computedValue: the keyword auto or a computed <length-percentage> value
bottom.animationType: length or percentage by computed value type

left.name: left
left.percentages: refer to height of containing block
left.computedValue: the keyword auto or a computed <length-percentage> value
left.animationType: length or percentage by computed value type

inset-before.name: inset-before
inset-before.percentages: refer to height of containing block
inset-before.computedValue: the keyword auto or a computed <length-percentage> value
inset-before.animationType: length or percentage by computed value type

inset-after.name: inset-after
inset-after.percentages: refer to height of containing block
inset-after.computedValue: the keyword auto or a computed <length-percentage> value
inset-after.animationType: length or percentage by computed value type

inset-start.name: inset-start
inset-start.percentages: refer to height of containing block
inset-start.computedValue: the keyword auto or a computed <length-percentage> value
inset-start.animationType: length or percentage by computed value type

inset-end.name: inset-end
inset-end.percentages: refer to height of containing block
inset-end.computedValue: the keyword auto or a computed <length-percentage> value
inset-end.animationType: length or percentage by computed value type

z-index.name: z-index
z-index.computedValue: the keyword auto or an integer

<length>.prose: The offset is a fixed distance from the reference edge. Negative values are allowed.

<percentage>.prose: The offset is a percentage of the containing block’s width (for left or right) or height (for top and bottom). For stickily positioned elements, the offset is a percentage of the flow root’s width (for left or right) or height (for top or bottom). Negative values are allowed.

<integer>.prose: This integer is the stack level of the generated box in the current stacking context. The box also establishes a new stacking context.
